title: AI Trends & Enterprise Adoption 2025
insights: AI adoption is accelerating in 2025. Enterprises spent $37B on generative AI. Vertical AI solutions are winning over horizontal ones. Compliance is becoming essential infrastructure. Indian enterprises are rapidly adopting AI for regulatory compliance..
linkedin: The $37B AI wave is here—and most companies are unprepared. Just came across an incredible breakdown on AI Trends & Enterprise Adoption 2025. Key insights that stood out: AI adoption is accelerating in 2025. Enterprises spent $37B on generative AI. Vertical AI solutions are winning over horizontal ones. Compliance is becoming essential infrastructure. Indian enterprises are rapidly adopting AI for regulatory compliance.. What struck me most: The pace of AI adoption isn't slowing—it's accelerating. Enterprises aren't just experimenting anymore; they're deploying at scale. This aligns perfectly with what I'm seeing building consently.in—DPDPA compliance isn't a "nice to have" anymore for Indian enterprises. It's becoming table stakes. What trends are you noticing in AI/ compliance space? #AI #SaaS #DPDPA #BuildingInPublic #StartupIndia 🎥 Source: https://youtu.be/o0ZDDkNd1Ns?si=obsBfAgDvnWcclig

Enterprises spent $37B on generative AI. Vertical AI solutions are winning over horizontal ones. Compliance is becoming essential infrastructure.
